TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AppearanceEditorPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart
Public NotInheritable Class AppearanceEditorPart Inherits EditorPart

summary.span: 提供一个编辑器控件，最终用户使用该控件可以编辑关联 控件的几个用户界面 (UI) 属性。

span.span: Provides an editor control that enables end users to edit several user interface (UI) properties on an associated control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 类是派生自一个编辑器控件类，并用于编辑影响外观的一个关联的属性或其他服务器控件。The class is an editor control that derives from the class, and is used to edit properties that affect the appearance of an associated or other server control. 控件使最终用户能够编辑的多个 UI 属性控件。The control enables end users to edit several UI properties of a control. 在相邻的单元格的下表中列出的页后，可以编辑每个属性值中显示的控件的类型。The type of control that appears in the page to edit each property value is listed in the adjacent cell of the following table. |PropertyProperty|控件用于编辑属性Control used to edit property| |--------------|-----------------------------------| ||一个控制用于设置标题文本。A control is used to set the text for the title.| ||一个使用控件来选择使用哪种类型的标题边框选项。A control is used to select what type of title-and-border option is used.| ||一个控件用于选择在页面的内容流动方向。A control is used to select the direction that content flows on the page.| ||一个控制用于设置高度，数值和一个控件用于选择单位。A control is used to set a number for the height, and a control is used to select the units.| ||一个控制用于设置高度，数值和一个控件用于选择单位。A control is used to set a number for the height, and a control is used to select the units.| ||一个控件用于指示是否隐藏控件。A control is used to indicate whether the control is hidden.| 仅当 Web 部件页处于编辑模式，以及时特定于控件变得可见控件已被选定进行编辑。The control becomes visible only when a Web Parts page is in edit mode, and when a specific control has been selected for editing. 控件，与所有其他值一样控制，驻留在区域。The control, like all other controls, resides in an zone. > [!IMPORTANT] > 区域只能包含控件，并控件不能放在任何其他类型的区域。An zone can contain only controls, and controls cannot be placed in any other type of zone. 类具有最少属性集。The class has a minimal set of properties. 属性用于获取或设置控件是否可见时显示为标题的字符串。The property is used to get or set a string that is displayed as a title when the control is visible. 属性设置中的继承的属性控件，以便默认控件接收焦点内的控件是中的默认值相同控件。The property sets the inherited property from the control, so that the default control that receives the focus within the control is the same as the default in the base control. 类还具有两个重要方法。The class also has two important methods. 方法重写基方法，从类。The method overrides the base method from the class. 此方法非常重要，因为它使获取属性值从控件它是编辑，并将其分配到编辑器控件中的字段。This method is critical because it enables getting the property values from the control it is editing and assigning them to the fields in the editor control. 方法也很重要，原因是需要的编辑控件中的用户设置的值，并更新正在编辑的控件上的这些属性值。The method is also important, because it takes the values set by the user in the editing controls, and updates those property values on the control being edited. 在大多数情况下控件应使用以页持久性格式声明``元素内的``元素，后者又包含由``在网页上的元素。In most cases the control should be used in page persistence format by declaring an `` element inside a `` element, which is in turn contained by an `` element on a Web page. 若要编辑其他属性和行为控件，你可以使用其他随 Web 部件控件集提供的控件。To edit other properties and behavior of controls, you can use the other controls supplied with the Web Parts control set. 这些控件包括，则，和。These controls include the , the , and the . 所提供控件应提供编辑所需的大多数编辑功能控件，但您还可以通过继承创建自定义编辑器控件类。The supplied controls should provide most editing features required to edit controls, but you can also create a custom editor control by inheriting from the class. 有关代码示例，请参阅类概述主题。For a code example, see the class overview topic. > [!NOTE] > 若要提高可访问性，控件中呈现`
`元素。To improve accessibility, the control is rendered within a `
` element. `
`元素中用于编辑的控件的相关的集分组控件使用，而且有助于在视觉对象 （如普通的 Web 浏览器） 和语音的用户代理的这些控件之间的选项卡式的导航 （如屏幕读取软件）。The `
` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software). ## 可访问性Accessibility 默认情况下，此控件呈现的标记可能不符合可访问性标准，如 Web 内容辅助功能准则 1.0 (WCAG) 优先级为 1 指导原则。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 有关此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明控件在网页上，并使其能够编辑的多个 UI 属性控件。The following code example demonstrates how to declare an control on a Web page, and enable it to edit several UI properties of a control. 代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 用户控件，可用于更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含的 Web 页面控件和一个控件，以及对自定义的引用控件。A Web page that contains an control and an control, along with a reference to a custom control. - 包含一个自定义的类控件。A class that contains a custom control. - 该示例时加载的页面在浏览器工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 用户控件的源代码来自另一个主题。The source code for the user control comes from another topic. 若要运行此代码示例，对于需要获取从用户控件的.ascx 文件[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)主题，并在此代码示例中的.aspx 页所在的文件夹中的文件的位置。For this code example to work, you need to obtain the .ascx file for the user control from the [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) topic, and place the file in the same folder as the .aspx page in this code example. 代码示例的第二部分是 Web 页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 它包含的声明性引用控件，其中的子``元素，其中包含对的声明性引用控件。It contains a declarative reference to an control, with a child `` element that contains declarative references to an control. 此外，页面引用自定义控件，并使用`Register`程序集指令和``控件元素。Also, the page references the custom control, using a `Register` directive for the assembly, and the `` element for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview/CS/appearanceeditorpartcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview/VB/appearanceeditorpartvb.aspx#1)] 代码示例的第三部分是一个自定义类名为`TextDisplayWebPart`，Web 页中引用了。The third part of the code example is a custom class named `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is referenced in the Web page. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#3)] 当在浏览器页面加载时，可以选择**编辑模式**中**显示模式**要切换到编辑模式下的下拉列表控件。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down control to switch to edit mode. 可以单击标题栏中的谓词菜单 （向下箭头）`TextDisplayWebPart`控件，然后单击**编辑**编辑该控件。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 编辑 UI 可见时，可以看到控件。When the editing UI is visible, you can see the control. 如果编辑的用户界面和单击进行一些更改**Apply**按钮，可以使用**显示模式**下拉列表以返回页后，可以浏览模式，然后查看完整的编辑更改的效果。If you make some changes in the editing UI and click the **Apply** button, you can use the **Display Mode** drop-down list to return the page to browse mode and see the full effect of the editing changes.

summary.span: 将 控件的值保存到关联 控件的相应属性。

span.span: Saves the values from an control to the corresponding properties in the associated control.

returns.span: 如果将值从 控件保存到 控件的操作成功，则为 ；否则（如果出现错误）为 。

span.span: if the action of saving values from the control to the control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是在上一个关键方法控件。The method is a critical method on a control. 用户单击表示为确定或编辑用户界面 (UI) 中的应用谓词的按钮时调用它。It is called when the user clicks a button representing an OK or an apply verb in the editing user interface (UI). 该方法的用途是保存用户已设置的值控件关联的对应属性控件。The method's purpose is to save the values a user has set on an control to the corresponding properties in the associated control. 引用关联的控件中的继承属性。The associated control is referenced in the inherited property. 方法尝试设置关联的以下属性控件：The method attempts to set the following properties on the associated control: - - - - - -

exception.span: 为正在编辑的 控件的以下任一属性设置值时发生错误：

span.span: An error occurs when setting the value for any of the following properties on the control that is being edited:
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

summary.span: 重写从 控件继承的基属性以在设计器中隐藏该属性，并防止它受主题影响。

span.span: Overrides the base property inherited from the control to hide the property from designers and prevent it from being affected by themes.

summary.span: 尽管此属性是公共的，但它用于此控件的默认呈现，不应从开发人员代码调用。

span.span: Though it is public, this property is used for default rendering of this control and is not intended to be called from developer code.

value.span: 一个字符串，该字符串包含接收 控件中的默认焦点的 控件的 ID。

span.span: A string that contains the ID of the control that receives the default focus in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

summary.span: 从 控件检索属性值并将这些属性值分配给关联 控件。

span.span: Retrieves the property values from a control and assigns them to the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是在上一个关键方法控件。The method is a critical method on an control. 它实现方法从基类中，检索从关联的当前值控件，并更新中的控件使用这些值，以便用户可以对其进行编辑的控件。It implements the method from the base class, retrieves the current values from the associated control, and updates the controls in the control with those values so a user can edit them. 调用方法时在关联的值控件可能已更改。The method is called whenever the values in the associated control might have changed. 有关控件，包含控件调用区域方法，以便中的值控件始终同步中关联的值与控件。For an control, the zone that contains the control calls the method, so that the values in the control are always synchronized with the values in the associated control. 另一种情况其中调用方法时控件进入编辑模式。Another case where the method is called is when a control is entering edit mode.

para.span: Web 部件控件集调用中的继承方法方法，因此，如果用户之后发生的任何更改上次查看之前编辑控件 （例如，共享的管理用户更改控件的会影响所有用户），在编辑过程中，这些更改将变得显而易见。

span.span: The Web Parts control set calls the method within the inherited method, so that if any changes occurred after the user last viewed the control prior to editing (for example, a shared administrative user made changes to the control that would affect all users), those changes would be evident during the editing process.

para.span: 如果创建自定义控件，可以遵循相同的方法，并调用方法从继承方法，以确保所有介入的更改同步的但不需要执行此操作。

span.span: If you create a custom control, you can follow the same approach, and call the method from the inherited method to ensure that any intervening changes are synchronized, but it is not necessary to do this.
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Title { get; set; }
.property instance string Title
Public Overrides Property Title As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Title : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置编辑器控件的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets a title for the editor control.

value.span: 用作控件标题的字符串。

span.span: A string that is used as the title of the control.

value.span: 默认值是 Web 部件控件集提供的、计算出的控件名称。

span.span: The default value is a calculated control name supplied by the Web Parts control set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值显示在标题栏的控制该控件在编辑模式中可见。The property value is displayed in the title bar of an control when the control is visible in edit mode. 当控件在页面中声明时，可以将值设置`Title`属性。When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the `Title` attribute. 如果未提供标题的值，特定于区域性的默认值用于描述此控件允许用户编辑的属性的类型。If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the kinds of properties that this control allows users to edit. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 代码示例演示如何设置标题中页持久性格式时``页中声明元素。The code example shows how to set the title in page persistence format when the `` element is declared in a page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview/CS/appearanceeditorpartcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview/VB/appearanceeditorpartvb.aspx#2)] 当在浏览器页面加载时，可以选择**编辑模式**中**显示模式**要切换到编辑模式下的下拉列表控件。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 可以单击标题栏中的谓词菜单 （向下箭头）`TextDisplayWebPart`控件，然后单击**编辑**编辑该控件。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 编辑用户界面 (UI) 可见时，可以看到控件的自定义标题。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see the control's custom title.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages
